question: In solid state, <katex>$PCl_{5}$</katex> is a/an:
choices: Covalent solid present in the form of <katex>$P_{2}Cl_{10}$</katex>
explanation: In the solid state, <katex>$PCl_5$</katex> exists as an ionic solid consisting of tetrahedral <katex>$[PCl_4]^+$</katex> cations and octahedral <katex>$[PCl_6]^-$</katex> anions.
